data.comment: The match has started.
Goal! Lennart Thy gives Sparta a 0-1 lead in Tilburg.
In the minute 6, Great play from Sven Mijnans to set up the goal.
Gorkem Saglam (Willem II) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Derrick Kohn (Willem II) has received a yellow card from Christaan Bax.
In the minute 31, Adrie Koster (Willem II) is making a first change, with Sebastian Holmen replacing the possibly injured Jordens Peters.
The first-half is over.
Goal! Deroy Duarte extends Sparta's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Willem II Stadion.
Willem II make their second substitution with Kwasi Okyere Wriedt replacing Che Nunnely.
Goal! Deroy Duarte extends Sparta's lead to 0-3.
In the minute 53, Sebastian Holmen for Willem II has been booked by Christaan Bax and receives a first yellow card.
Sparta's Bart Vriends has been booked in Tilburg.
Henk Fraser (Sparta) is making a first substitution, with Mario Engels replacing Bryan Smeets.
In the minute 70, The away team have replaced Sven Mijnans with Wouter Burger. This is the second substitution made today by Henk Fraser.
Reda Kharchouch is on a sub for Lennart Thy for Sparta.
Adrie Koster is making the team's third substitution at Willem II Stadion with Wesley Spieringhs replacing Freek Heerkens.
In the minute 85, Tom Beugelsdijk is replacing Bart Vriends for Sparta at Willem II Stadion.
Danzell Gravenberch is replacing Deroy Duarte for the away team.
The match has come to a close in Tilburg. The final score is 1-3.
Kwasi Okyere Wriedt puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 1-3.
Vangelis Pavlidis instrumental with a fine assist.
